title: Websites from scratch
subheader: Website development from scratch using new technologies and JavaScript and TypeScript frameworks, which allow us to create vibrant and unique websites.

title: Development of a cryptocurrency exchange
subheader: Exchange development, migration to a new accounting system. Implementation of CI/CD for automatic code updates and production release. Execution of high-load algorithms.

title: Accepting payments for utility services
subheader: The payment service is designed to accept payments from the public on behalf of utility companies and operates on the basis of a proprietary data exchange protocol. It allows for real-time synchronization of payments and recalculation of charges.

title: Improving customer service quality
subheader: Software for implementing prepaid payment functionality in bank branches and payment terminals. Allows operation on very weak communication channels. Transmits data in encrypted form upon receipt of payment.

title: Mobile application development
subheader: Development of a mobile application in Flutter, which allows you to develop applications for multiple platforms simultaneously on a single code base.

title: Data collection from meters
subheader: Development of an electronic device for collecting information from electronic meters. Design of printed circuit boards. Setting up large-scale production.

title: Backend for working with Blockchain
subheader: Development of a modern Backend application for working with popular Blockchain Nodes. Or configuration for working with local Nodes.
